metadata.title: CVE-2023-5721 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It was possible for certain browser prompts and dialogs to be activated ordismissed unintentionally by the user due to an insufficientactivation-delay. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 119, Firefox ESR <115.4, and Thunderbird < 115.4.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
